title: ‘Chinese New Year’ Sales
teaser: Sales is a duo from Florida with an almost unsearchable band name.  Here’s their latest single called “Chinese New Year” to welcome the start of the new lunar new year, the year of the horse.
contentencoded: Sales is a duo from Florida with an almost unsearchable band name.  Here’s their latest single called “Chinese New Year” to welcome the start of the new lunar new year, the year of the horse.
